name: Unstable Piles
description:
Controls:

Drop Boxes - Space or Left Mouse Button

This is the first project I created from scrach and this is my first participation in Ludum Dare.

Unstable Piles is a puzzle game that aims to create piles of boxes. The game's difficulty comes from the randomness of the crates. Some crates are big and some are small, which interferes with pile physics. Other crates are explosive and they can destroy other crates and also knock down piles.
